Liono Looks at Ramhorn "Your in charge of base defense do as you see fit I 
have to head down to the beach."  Turns and Faces Tigerhawk" Finish the Terra 
Star we need it as soon I we make a peace Treaty." Places a Card Key in 
Tigerhawk's hand "This will get you into Area 9.6 with Maximum Clearance." 
Liono hits the Loud screen "All maximals engage attacking enemy."
